about_the_game:
A BGM pack will be added that includes the following 20 recorded tracks from Nights of Azure 2: Bride of the New Moon.
BGM can be changed at the desk in the Atelier.
Tracks included:

- Brides Room
- mi'd rauna
- El Viento
- Azure Memories
- Monumento Antiguo
- Laboratory
- Deep Blue Zero Castle
- Destino
- Whatever the Outcome
- Omen
- Imperatrix
- Malvasia
- Strange Puppet Fish
- David
- No Fear
- Sadistic Limbs
- Those Who Detest Blood
- Rivalry at the Boundary
- Blue Blood Abyss
- Love Song of War

*This content is also included in the "Atelier Lydie & Suelle Season Pass."

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (64bit required)
  • Processor: Core i5 2.6GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX550Ti or better, 1280x720
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OnBoard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (64bit required)
  • Processor: Core i7 3.40GHz over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080 NVIDIA GeForce GTX1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit Stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played

short_description: A BGM pack that includes 20 tracks from Nights of Azure 2: Bride of the New Moon will be added. BGM can be changed at the desk in the Atelier. *This content is also included into "Atelier Lydie & Suelle Season Pass."
